nodes.text: The Fourth Nantama Synod was a meeting that was held on the world of Nantama during the time of the Galactic Republic.

The synod was held between the ruling houses of the Senex-Juvex and at the meeting, they decided to seek peace with the Galactic Republic. As a result, the Republic awarded the Senex-Juvex region sectorial status and the Senex lords attempted to establish commercial relations with the Republic.
